newsitem.title: CANADA: RESEARCH ALERT - Merrill starts communications cos.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Merrill starts communications cos.

text.p: -- Merrill Lynch said it initiated coverage of several Canadian communications companies, such as Rogers Communications Inc. Merrill started coverage of Rogers as near-term neutral and as long-term accumulate.
-- Merrill Lynch initiated coverage of Shaw Communications Inc as both near-term and long-term accumulate.
-- Merrill also initiated coverage of Videotron Groupe Ltee as both near-term and long-term accumulate.
-- Merrill also raised its rating of Rogers Cantel Mobile Communications Inc to near-term accumulate from near-term neutral.
